A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing. Can’t remember feeling this poorly about spending money to see a movie in a theater. There were two or three character arcs that had a chance from #7; all of them were basically killed off or rendered useless. (Skywalker\, Snoke and Rey/Kilo) I remember when the movie Batman and Robin was basically created by the toy industry\, this had that feel - This is where we want this to go\, because we own all the content and need to stretch it on for a few decades. Durn and Del toro\, basically serious acting chops\, leading useless characters. In hindsight after a few months\, its almost like since Johnson and Abrams\, come form the same director collective; that this is an ego driven who can make a bigger mess project. As for the\, well old people don’t get it; I have two twin three years olds that won’t know Star Wars - I wouldn’t want them to waste their time on this franchise 3 maybe 4 movies out of 7 (soon 8) isn’t worth it
